website_summaries.verdict: A good unit for placing heat in a specific area such as on on a person or pet.
pros: Lower energy consumption than some other heaters
Puts out a nice warm heat
Oscillates and has an adjustable angle
cons: Not as heavy-duty as some others available

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved it the first month and a half but of course it stopped heating up shortly after the return window passed... Still oscillates, but useless as an actual heater. It did a great job warming up small to mid sized rooms but is clearly of poor quality and now I'm looking for another brand of this type to repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Two issues before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for office and home use. I’ve used them a lot. There are two issues. Some of the built-in heat limit sensors shut the heater down even on low. It takes 10-20 minutes to reset. The other issue is when the adlustable tilt knob does not hold the angle desired. It slowing tilts forward no matter how tight the average person tightens it.
customer_reviews.author: ConflictManager

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as Soleus parabolic heaters
customer_reviews.text: Until earlier this week I had been using a Soleus parabolic heater for years, but it broke. I turned it on one day and there was a bright flash and a loud pop. When I searched for a replacement Soleus this model comes up instead. I figured how much different could it be? A lot it turns out. This one smells when its on, the front center piece gets very hot and could burn you, your kids, or your pets. It doesn't reflect nearly as much heat as the Soleus did and is much cheaper made.
customer_reviews.author: C Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Greater heater!
customer_reviews.text: Great heater! This is a great heater if you wish to heat a certain area, sitting on the sofa. Problem with regular heaters in a open room that they continuously run and you cannot get the area to stay warm since the warm air is escaping to the rest of the house. So far, this unit works well. Low energy usage, high heat.
customer_reviews.author: George...

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I guess this isn't bad for some people, but I got spoiled by my Presto dish heater that has a larger dish and internal thermostat and stronger heat output. However, the price difference is a lot. I also had a little issue with keeping the tilt to work, it kept easing its way down from its upward position, maybe the knob has to be ultra tightened beyond what my efforts were, returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: It does get hot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight heater with a LOT of powerful heat that comes out of it. Definitely keep it at a distance from furniture because it gets really hot! I really like the heater in that it is a radiant heater and not a blower heater. I think it makes it easier to control the heat. You can turn the oscillation on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different heater
customer_reviews.text: We bought two on December 13th 2017 one for our home and the other for my office. Noticed it was not heating well . The coils do not light up at all on the low setting and not all the way on the high setting. They both no longer work and no glow. See above as pictured. So sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Manchon

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off after 10min
customer_reviews.text: We lived this when we first bought it, other than it being pretty bright on the high setting. Within a few weeks it would make a loud click when osculating, and then it started shutting off after 10min. We would turn it off, wait for a click meaning it reset itself, then turn it on low and 10min later it shuts off again. We've put up with this for a while but I finally ordered a different heater.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Love the silence and the warmth
customer_reviews.text: We have just used it one night and the silence of it is amazing! The heat was also perfect to keep the room nice and warm! I do recomend this product. As far as the seller goes, the package arrived on time and in perfect shape, it was boxed, so that shipping company did not know what my package was about and it was padded with air bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Hott!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, my only complaint is its like having a light on in my room at night. Very affordable on the electric bill and EXTREMELY warm. It gets hot so not suitable for small children and I have to watch my cats carefully, but it is so very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater and I may have just had the bad luck of getting one that was defective. I plugged it in to check it and it immediately started smoking. I know that can be normal for first-time use so I let it slide. I also noticed the coil inside didn't heat all the way even though I had it on the "high" setting. After a half hour it just stopped working all together. I returned it the next day. It may have been defective but I just wanted to write this as a safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: Durell Duran

customer_reviews.title: They stink
customer_reviews.text: I basically wanted a quiet radiant heater. When used in the stationery mode it is quiet. So that is good. The main problem is that after many hours of use it still emanates an obnoxious smell, so I feel compelled to air out the room, which defeats the purpose. I finally moved it to a semi-outdoor area for pets where the smell is less bothersome. The other detriment is that it has two levels of heat, but no thermostatic adjustment so that it can control itself based on temperature. This is a cheap item, I would not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: swlinguist

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this heater for two weeks, and it worked great- until it didn’t. First, the oscillate feature stopped working (which i was ok with, as the heater still worked), but then the “low” setting quit working as well. So, now it only works on high, which trips my outlet and turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Lo and Hi heat setting only. Lo is too HIGH.
customer_reviews.text: There are only two settings for heat, Hi and Lo. The problem is that Lo is too high if the intent is to simply keep a cold bedroom warm. It is constantly on and will soon make the room unbearably hot. It would be better if the heating element cycled off and on like most heaters with a rheostatic power setting. If you are wondering if it will turn itself off if accidentally tipped over (maybe by a pet or child), the answer is yes. It has a pressure switch on the base that causes it to automatically turn off if the unit is not sitting upright.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little heater. Puts out a lot of heat. Does not get hot to the touch..so I don't worry about my dog passing infront. Has a nice depressed handle for easy moving.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Our dogs are warm again.
customer_reviews.text: This heater is simple to use, lightweight and the dogs love being warm again. I appreciate the price point on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana John Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand !
customer_reviews.text: It kept turning itself off. I couldn’t use it on high temperature for more than three minutes before it would turn itself off. It was essentially worthless but if you only need a little tiny bit of heat, cheap, I guess it would do the trick. The concept is nice, it just doesn’t work. What good is a heater that won’t even run for a few hours on low?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

customer_reviews.title: smells awful, continuously
customer_reviews.text: Now going on continuous use for over 40 hours and the plastic smell has barely diminished, fills entire floor of house with smell of plastic and has me sneezing constantly, even with window open. If the smell ever goes away, this will still make it a 1-star item.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Rizos

customer_reviews.title: Good heater
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I love it. It heats up quickly and works really well. I've been using it on and off during the winter for over a year. I keep my apartment thermostat quite low to cut down on heating bills and this little heater helps keep me warm. I feel safe using it and unplug it at night to prevent any accidental fires.
customer_reviews.author: bubbo

customer_reviews.title: Warms up my whole room quick!
customer_reviews.text: 👍 works great. I start it on hi for a minute, then turn it down to low. Works great I can't imagine having to leave it on high all night, it warms up my whole room quick on low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY. This was purchased in Spring, used only a handful of times and no longer works now that it’s Fall and temps are lower. It gives off initial heat, then shuts itself off and does not heat up again unless unplugged and re- plugged again. Even still, it will only heat for an initial time before shutting off. Oscillation works but heat coils do not. Basically a waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Duran Motts

customer_reviews.title: Product not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: What a worthless product it is. It stopped working just after 30 days i.e. When the return window expired. Have contacted customer service multiple times and the phone is never answered, and says you cant even leave a voice message. Have left a note in the contact us in their website, and hoping to hear back. Wouldn't recommend the product at all. Forget about buying, nowonwards I would think twice ordering Comfort Zone products even for free. It isn't worth anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMEDED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater at the end of November 2019 and used it very sparingly. Today is April 12, 2020 and the heater is oscillating but no heat is coming out. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Diva

customer_reviews.title: Thin plastic heater
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but is is very cheaply made, doesn’t stay in position too well, and I have concerns the plastic it’s made of us going to eventually melt. I do like that it oscillates and it is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: T Ferg

customer_reviews.title: warms pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, initially I thought it might not be good as it was cheaper that other heaters similar to this one, but I am very happy with the heater and its has not prob since i have bought it, this is 3 rd winters that I am using it, I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kailash

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver! It is very powerful and comes with an oscillating and still setting. I would freeze without this, especially in the winter, getting out of a shower with wet hair :O Everyone who lives anywhere where it is ever cold NEEDS this.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Rotates
customer_reviews.text: It works well. One can feel the heat. It is better than the 30" tall Sunbeam model we have. The Sunbeam portable heater was noisy. The ones at Costco are about twice as much $$ and probably do put out any more heat than this one. It is quiet and it rotates. It is hot enough to pull back the sheets and get frisky with one's spouse. Only good for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Adams

customer_reviews.title: great heater
customer_reviews.text: this radiant heater runs silent and heats up my very large bedroom with high ceilings very quickly and keeps the bedroom at a just right warm temperature throughout the night without it being too steamy hot. I start it out at the high setting to chase the chills out of the room then before sleeping turn it to low...perfect heater great price.
customer_reviews.author: Fig Ally

customer_reviews.title: Toasty!
customer_reviews.text: Warmth year round in Colorado! I take it everywhere with me throughout the house as I am always cold. Besides to heat the house to my liking would bankrupt anyone! Quiet, safe, warm, what else is there?
customer_reviews.author: Desert Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right away.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate the heat stopped working when the oscillation was turned on. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: IsThatSo

customer_reviews.title: it works great and heats fast- I have not used it much ...
customer_reviews.text: it works great and heats fast- I have not used it much cause now the weather is getting hotter- so I dont know If I can say I love it - cause I haven't used it much - but so far it great-
customer_reviews.author: COCOCHANEL

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The first fan we ordered had a broken stand, which speaks poorly to the quality control department given that the package didn't have a mark on it. The second fan quit heating after less than an hour of use. I cannot imagine any way that these are a value, unless you happen to get lucky and buy one that is not defective in some way.
customer_reviews.author: kkathryn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a lot of heat, warms our business quickly for our customers
customer_reviews.author: Steven Z.

customer_reviews.title: heats a larger area than i expected. update one  has quit working
customer_reviews.text: keeps my shop nice and warm. i am happily surprised how well these heat. update, one heater has stopped working, no help from company
customer_reviews.author: SUE

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Heat output is alright, half of the coils stopped working the day we got it, oscillating motor went out after a month. Would recommend spending a little bit more money and getting a heat dish from Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Parents

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine for 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for bout 15 minutes and shut off and died.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Product is super thin and delicate. Came all bent up. Worked for about 2 years then quit. It now resides somewhere in a landfill where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Crow

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Zone radiant heater
customer_reviews.text: This product was to heat my art studio. It has been not working correctly since I purchased. It is turned on, then it goes off and continues to do this time after time. It is Comfort Zone CZ998 oscillating radiant dish heater with adjustable back. I would like it replaced because It iis a good heater, reputation wise. Susan michalski
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy !!
customer_reviews.text: Please please do not buy !!! The heat was amazing but after 1 month the low setting stopped working and 1 week later the whole heater fan stopped working... I didn’t leave the fan on all day every day so that’s not why .... WARNING PLEASE DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY BY BUYING THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: already doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I got this heater 31 jan , 11 feb its already broke, it doesnt work at all dont bother with this heater waste of money
customer_reviews.author: frank sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good heater if you only need it 3 months ..
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few parabolic heaters from Harbor Freight. I bought this unit for cost and the 1000w setting being higher than the 600w cheaper ones. It worked great for about 3 months. It has quit even sooner than the HF units and cost almost twice as much. So you guys do the math.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I like the heater however we received it damaged. The unit looks like it was dropped. Heating element is all bent and smashed plus the outside of unit is dented and miss formed. My husband ripped up the box before he inspected it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but conitually smelled like melting plastic
customer_reviews.text: Product was used for a couple weeks, but conitually smelled like melting plastic! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Gill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy to use, & quite.
customer_reviews.text: Heater is ready to use right outta the box. It puts out enough heat to warm 3 rooms (my use for it). My only knock on it is the hand carry should have a non slip pad on it. And there is no noise.
customer_reviews.author: DWLippy

customer_reviews.title: keeps our 320 square feet living room comfortable and it arrived a few days ahead of scheduled ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the oscillating radiant heater does everything the supplier claims, keeps our 320 square feet living room comfortable and it arrived a few days ahead of scheduled delivery..
customer_reviews.author: Bob Numbers

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: All coils dont light up and advertised a fan blower for that model no timer on it very disappointed for that price the one from aldis is much better easy home brand
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last 2 months in my little greenhouse. All my plants died in one night when it failed. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Heats great especially if rotating
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last rotating more than 1 1/2 to 2 yrs have to replace. if using all winter long stops rotating but heating element still work.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine222

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice radiating heat. We used it in the garage last winter.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Hurst

customer_reviews.title: overheats and stops working
customer_reviews.text: when on high heat the machine will overheat and then shuts off. it seems that one then needs to turn the heater off for half hour or so before it starts working again. the low heat setting does work ok.
customer_reviews.author: shri amin

customer_reviews.title: It works fine so far
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a heater to just warm me. It does exactly that! When I put this in my cart about 3 to 4 weeks ago, it was 40 something dollars. When I went to purchase it several weeks later, it had jumped in price about $100! I find that very odd! I bought one that had been returned for about $50.00. It works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Teri B

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy of heating up my rooms with this heater. Great value! Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Lee K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly effective
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this unit for a week. Still, here are my thoughts- amazing value for the money. Beams heat in a straight line at least 10 feet, my wife is cozy on the couch now without turning the heat up in the house or having to wear a blanket. Oh high heat, THE FULL COILS ARE NOT SUPPOSED TO GLOW, they have even placed a sticker on the unit to this effect. Please read explanations elsewhere for the reason - but ignore the reviews complaining about not all coils lighting up when on "high". Unit is virtually silent and quite effective. I consider it a bargain at this price and will be getting another!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives off very good heat in a small room and the oscillating is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wright

customer_reviews.title: It works very well and heats up quickly. My ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very well and heats up quickly. My dog loves it and has been hanging out near it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great I live in my fifth wheel I have two of them very very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not put out much heat and the coils did ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not put out much heat and the coils did not completely heat up; only half hot. Not a lot of output.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stnegel

customer_reviews.title: Mine had coil problems.
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the fan coils heated up. But Amazon took the return.
customer_reviews.author: ed luedke

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: the description was misleading, it said instant heat and it was not. It took too long to heat up and on a few of the coils heated up even on the high setting.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Helton

customer_reviews.title: I live in a studio so something small like this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio so something small like this is perfect. I’ve had I️t for over a year and I️ use I️t faithfully, sometimes all throughout the night and I️t hasn’t burnt out yet. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: It’s heats up quickly and is very warm. Use it in my garage. Love that is oscillating feature.
customer_reviews.author: ANITA M GENTRY

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken and never worked. Very light weight and felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great, little heater!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this little heater! I like it so much that I'd like to order another, but in a few short days, the price has increased by around $18! I guess I'll have to look elsewhere =(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the on/off switch operates on it's own - will not stay on. Otherwise the heating ability was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Freak

customer_reviews.title: This was said to be in very good shape and when I got it the Box had ...
customer_reviews.text: This was said to be in very good shape and when I got it the Box had no damage but the housing on the heater was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it. Got one for our home and loved ...
customer_reviews.text: Visited family in Montana and they had this heater, loved it. Got one for our home and loved it even more. Safe and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEATER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is one POWERFUL HEATER!!! Totally heard up the whole room and my room is huge and that’s just at medium temperature!! WE ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: SBCB

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter at college. She used it for less than 4 months (winter) and now it stopped working. I am spending money again on this product since she needs something ASAP and I do not have time to think.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita Thakar

customer_reviews.title: Good heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater for my dog in the garage. He love it because I can see him in the garage on my camera that's where he sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: bob s.

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for - so not so great
customer_reviews.text: using this heater but it is made of cheap plastic and the front protector gets too hot..
customer_reviews.author: TheDude54

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Not as powerful as I thought it should be. Does not radiate heat very far. Seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bad Smell when turned on. Feared it may cause a fire and had to return it to seller ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Cables have a defective contact.
customer_reviews.text: They are in perfect condition and we barely moved them from their place. The cables are having a defective contact. You have to adjust them and play a little and then they work. We've had these for about 2 months. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Hanisch

customer_reviews.title: but indoors or in ofice wpuld be nice, i use it
customer_reviews.text: wish it drew more heat, but indoors or in ofice wpuld be nice, i use it outdoors
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Great heater it puts off alot of heat
customer_reviews.text: Great heater it puts off alot of heat. The only thing that bothered me was that it only worked for Oscillation once then never again if that still worked it would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: It's battery powered and safe to use, when we have power Outages
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to use the fan, when ever the lights go out
customer_reviews.author: Linda P. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: One has to stand on head to turn on and off!!
customer_reviews.text: I really miss a remote control. I use it for direct heat for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Worked as expected. I bought 2 of them and would definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: rudy aguero

customer_reviews.title: PUSH THE CHILL BACK!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good heater for one room. Its absolutely silent and won't be a bother while watching TV or taking naps, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TOUG

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a great small heater, will heat about a 10' radius in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Selina

customer_reviews.title: Got used one!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously there’re scratch marks all over and I can tell it was used item I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: none
customer_reviews.text: So far after used I used it for my dogs and plants on my screen in porch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Armbrister

customer_reviews.title: The heater.
customer_reviews.text: It cuts out every other time, 15 min. Run time. 2 weeks after getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It heats just fine as advertised but it was way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It heats just fine as advertised but it was way overpriced. I prefer the radiant heat without the fan noise and have several around the house which I've bought for less cash and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great movement. Nice size for a small room
customer_reviews.text: Heat and lots of it. Quiet. Great movement. Nice size for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Runs all night most of the day. Gets warm. Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe lomeli saucedouiiuu777lp0⁰  4jjh as ajkkklllllollllñ

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet heat source for a bathroom or other small space.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: The heater is great. Does all it says it will. Quietest oscillator ever.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked great for 3 months,,,now heat goes out after about 5-6 minutes,,,would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rex Turner

customer_reviews.title: They work great. Due to my error they sent me 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Due to my error they sent me 4 more than I needed but I was able to sell them to relatives and they all like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Keeney

customer_reviews.title: however the unit appears to function fine.
customer_reviews.text: The heating element was installed a little off axis for the parabolic reflector, however the unit appears to function fine.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only half of the wire worked, it don't provide enough heat.
customer_reviews.author: jessie peng

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small space, and this is perfect for it. No problems thus far, although I haven't had it for long. I don't use the oscillating feature at all, however, so I can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. Hier

customer_reviews.title: Great product/wonderful space heater
customer_reviews.text: One of the better space heaters we have purchased as there is no noise whatsoever from this unit. The unit throws the heat quite far and that is a good thing. Only thing is that I wish it was just a tad bit bigger to give even more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Speeckaert

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I'd hoped. It started to smoke so much it set off the smoke alarm. I'm going to return it and try something different.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patterson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Only half of the coils heat up. It would be warmer if all the coils worked.
customer_reviews.author: Burley

customer_reviews.title: it works great for this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to heat up before using my Ashley Black Fascia Blaster, it works great for this. I get direct heat that warms the skin within minutes and the oscillating feature keeps me warm throughout the blasting process.
customer_reviews.author: Laraed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very handy. for the price, unbeatable! (hopefully it lasts some years) UPDATE: purchased on 9/21/16 and it officially died january 2018, lasting only a little over a year. but even in late 2017 it wanted to crap out. kinda upset it didn't crap out 9/20/17 because then it would've still been under warranty!!! grrr. go figure
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: ... package was all tore up but the heater is better then expected I live in a fifth wheeler turned ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the heater on time the package was all tore up but the heater is better then expected I live in a fifth wheeler turned the heater on in the bedroom less then 10 minutes later had to turn it of and get out the bedroom got to hot to stay in there. I recommend this heater for bedroom it is perfect also no noise what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Highwind

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan puts out heat works good so far.

product_meta.title: Comfort Zone CZ998 Electric Oscillating Radiant Dish Heater with Adjustable Tilt, Black
product_meta.description: Powerful Fan with Two Adjustable Heat Settings Equipped with two heat settings and a powerful 14" dish reflector, the Comfort Zone Oscillating Radiant Dish Heater lets you circulate air throughout your space with ease. Not only does the powerful radiant heater generate heat in small spaces, it also circulates the air with the fan to warm up cold rooms in just a few minutes. Exceptional Safety Features Equipped with an overheat protection system featuring automatic shut-off in the event of overheating, this radiant heater is safe for indoor use in residential homes. For added protection, the built-in tip-over switch shuts off the power if the unit is accidentally knocked over. Complete Control Over Air Output This oscillating radiant heater features 70-degree oscillation that circulates air throughout a small room with ease. This helps push warm or hot air to the farthest corners of your space, filling the room with a comfortable, warm breeze. The adjustable tilt can be directed up or down, allowing you to direct the air output wherever you need it. Cool-to-the-Touch Grille With a flocked safety grille that stays cool to the touch, you can easily move this fan from room to room without burning your hands. The smart design lets you transport the heater from your office or workshop to your bedroom with ease, so you can bring a blast of warm air with you wherever you need it. Just plug it in and enjoy. Versatile Design From filling your bedroom with a warm breeze on cold winter evenings to directing hot air at your pipes to prevent freezing, this versatile radiant heater offers numerous use cases. Simply plug it in and point the heater in the direction you need to circulate warm air.
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE HEAT OUTPUT: Choose between 2 heat settings to warm up any small room.
COMPACT DESIGN: Providing significant heat output considering its small size, this radiant heater with 14" dish reflector can be placed in virtually any room to provide warmth.
PRECISE CONTROL: Featuring a 70-degree oscillation and an adjustable tilt, you can customize the direction of the radiant heater to circulate warm air whenever you need it.

VERSATILE HEATER: Great for heating small rooms or preventing pipes from freezing, this heater is a must-have for homeowners in colder climates who need help optimizing the temperature of their space.

SUPERIOR SAFETY: Featuring a tip-over switch to prevent fire and electrical shock and overheat protection to automatically shut off in the case of overheating, this radiant heater is built for safety.
